column4: Tried that, but when I go to update and click "check" it goes stright to file 30 of 47 and gets stuck...
Sorry, no change with autoclean. Where are those files? Will deleting them help with it getting stuck?
that folder contains archives (folder), pkgcache.bin and srcpkgcache.bin
That says it has changed zero files. I guess the files already there are ok. It just doesn't want to download any more.
